MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Fazakerley, Liverpool affecting properties in  Brookfield Business Park and the surrounding area. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate a possible blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15AM on 27th January 2021
